description: The Kicking Horse Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Kicking Horse for the snow report
Alexa, ask Kicking Horse for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Kicking Horse
shortDescription: The Kicking Horse Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Kicking Horse.
